message.name: ERR_SOEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_IS_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_WITH_SERVICEOFFERING_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The service evaluation criterion %1s is already associated with the service offering %2s, it cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SOEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_IS_USED_IN_SERVICE_EVALUATION_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The evaluation criterion %1s is used in service evaluation(s), it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SOEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_IS_USED_IN_SERVICE_EVALUATION_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The evaluation criterion %1s is used in service evaluation(s), it cannot be deleted.
